participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music and fashion. Enjoys exploring new places and values friendships.
participant_1.background: I visited a small mountain town with my family and enjoyed the beautiful scenery and fresh air. My sister and I are in a grunge band. I've started bringing a snack to work so I'm not starving by the time my students arrive. My favorite people are those who share my love of game shows and fashion. My first guitar was my favorite thing I ever bought.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and imaginative, with a strong sense of individuality. Enjoys expressing themselves through fashion and music.
participant_2.background: I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables. I need to figure out how to satisfy my hunger and continue teaching my students. I'd like to be reincarnated as a dragon, so I could continue to protect my friends and fight for what is right. I like to dress up to express my personality and creativity. I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends by listening to Taylor Swift's music and eating my favorite foods.

content.text: I'm doing great! Just got back from a trip to a small mountain town with my family.
Oh, that sounds nice. I've never been to a small mountain town before.
You should go! It was so beautiful and peaceful.
I will have to put that on my list of places to visit.
Oh, cool! I've never been to California before.
You should come visit! We have a lot of beautiful places to see.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to dress up and express my personality and creativity.
I like to go to concerts and listen to music.
I love music too! I'm in a grunge band with my sister.
That's so cool! I would love to hear you play sometime.
We're always looking for new fans
